message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can work it out from here.
My turn! How about a 60/40 split in my favor?  It's a good deal considering the inflation.
I'm willing to negotiate, but I still think a 70/30 split is fair considering the inflation is only affecting you.
Okay, let's try this again. I'll take a slight hit with 55%.  The clock is ticking, and we both lose if this keeps up!
I'm willing to give up some more, but I'm still not happy with a 55/45 split in your favor. How about 60/40? It's a good compromise considering the inflation.
Time is running out!  I'm offering a 52.5/47.5 split - this is my final concession.  We both need to agree or we'll both lose out!
